purpose_text.para: Selects an error record to be accessed through the Error Record System registers.

configuration_text.para: If ERRIDR_EL1 indicates that zero error records are implemented, then it is IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED whether ERRSELR_EL1 is UNDEFINED or RES0.

field_description.para: Selects the error record accessed through the ERX registers.
For example, if ERRSELR_EL1.SEL is 0x0004, then direct reads and writes of ERXSTATUS_EL1 access ERR4STATUS.
If ERRSELR_EL1.SEL is greater than or equal to ERRIDR_EL1.NUM, then all of the following apply:

listitem.content: The value read back from ERRSELR_EL1.SEL is UNKNOWN.
One of the following occurs: An UNKNOWN error record is selected. The ERX*_EL1 registers are RAZ/WI. ERX*_EL1 register reads and writes are NOPs. ERX*_EL1 register reads and writes are UNDEFINED.
